name: Bergamot Essential Oil
notes: Bright, sparkling citrus with subtle floral undertones. Essential for cologne-style fragrances.

name: Jasmine Absolute
notes: Rich, indolic white floral. Heady and narcotic with honey-like sweetness.

name: Sandalwood Essential Oil
notes: Creamy, smooth, milky wood note. Provides excellent fixative properties.

name: Vanilla Absolute
notes: Sweet, creamy, balsamic. Madagascar vanilla with rich depth.

name: Rose Otto (Bulgarian)
notes: Exquisite rose scent with honey and spice nuances. The finest rose oil.

name: Vetiver Essential Oil
notes: Earthy, woody, smoky with slight lemon undertone. Haiti origin.

name: Lavender Essential Oil
notes: Fresh, herbaceous, slightly camphoraceous. French lavender variety.

name: Patchouli Essential Oil
notes: Dark, earthy, sweet-herbaceous. Ages beautifully, becoming smoother.

name: Lemon Essential Oil
notes: Sharp, fresh, clean citrus. Cold-pressed from Italian lemons.

name: Frankincense Essential Oil
notes: Resinous, woody, slightly spicy. Sacred and meditative quality.

name: Ylang Ylang Essential Oil
notes: Sweet, exotic, slightly fruity floral. Creamy and narcotic.

name: Cedarwood Atlas Essential Oil
notes: Dry, woody, pencil-shaving character. Excellent fixative.

name: Black Pepper Essential Oil
notes: Spicy, warm, sharp. Adds sparkle and depth to compositions.

name: Tonka Bean Absolute
notes: Sweet, warm, almond-like with vanilla nuances. Coumarinic.

name: Grapefruit Essential Oil
notes: Fresh, slightly bitter, uplifting. Pink grapefruit variety.

name: Iris Butter (Concrete)
notes: Powdery, elegant, violet-like. Root-derived with earthy facets.

name: Benzoin Resinoid
notes: Sweet, balsamic, vanilla-like. Siam benzoin with excellent fixative properties.

name: Oakmoss Absolute
notes: Earthy, forest-like, green. Classic foug√®re ingredient with powerful tenacity.

name: Pink Pepper Essential Oil
notes: Rosy, peppery, slightly sweet. Modern spice note with floral aspects.

name: Ambroxan (Synthetic)
notes: Amber, marine, woody-musky. Modern ambergris replacement with excellent diffusion.
